docs.snippet: Coroner HESLEWOOD held an inquest on Saturday, at Tompkinsville, S.I., upon the body of Mr. CORNELIUS G. KOLFT, who was found drowned on Friday in Richmond Lake. The following testimony was taken:

headline.main: Staten Island.; INQUEST ON THE BODY OF MR. KOLFT--VERDICT OF ACCIDENTAL DROWNING.

docs.lead_paragraph: Coroner HESLEWOOD held an inquest on Saturday, at Tompkinsville, S.I., upon the body of Mr. CORNELIUS G. KOLFT, who was found drowned on Friday in Richmond Lake. The following testimony was taken:

docs.snippet: It is not true, as reported from here, that Lord LYONS is fitting up his residence for the reception of the Prince of Wales. He has no knowledge of the intention of the Prince to visit Washington, but thinks it probable he may do so.

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; FROM WASHINGTON. The Visit of the Prince of Wales--Recent Changes and Appointments in the Army.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is not true, as reported from here, that Lord LYONS is fitting up his residence for the reception of the Prince of Wales. He has no knowledge of the intention of the Prince to visit Washington, but thinks it probable he may do so.

docs.snippet: The last four or five years have made very great changes in the form and substance of our City Government. Very much of the lumbering old machinery which tradition had fastened upon us, as essential to a municipal system, has been swept away, and...

headline.main: What is the Use of the Common Council?

docs.lead_paragraph: The last four or five years have made very great changes in the form and substance of our City Government. Very much of the lumbering old machinery which tradition had fastened upon us, as essential to a municipal system, has been swept away, and more effective...

headline.main: Coroners' Inquests.; ANOTHER CASE OF MISMANAGEMENT IN THE INSTI. TUTIONS.
